info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:17PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and brief heavy rainfall will impact portions of Schenectady, northern Albany, southeastern Fulton, southern Saratoga and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 500 PM EST... At 415 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Gloversville to near Sharon Springs. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Amsterdam and Fort Johnson around 420 PM EST. Hagaman around 425 PM EST. Glenville around 430 PM EST. Duanesburg, Delanson and Burnt Hills around 440 PM EST. Ballston Spa, Country Knolls and Rotterdam Junction around 445 PM EST. Rotterdam, Scotia, Altamont and Round Lake around 450 PM EST. Schenectady, Mechanicville, Guilderland, Niskayuna, East Glenville and Alplaus around 455 PM EST. Albany, Clifton Park, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Latham, Menands and Loudonville around 500 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Shakers, Bleecker Stadium, Glenridge, Hoffmans, Rockwell Corners, Harding Crossing, Willow Glen, Young Corners, Garrison Manor and Quaker Street. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 24 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 6 and 27. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 24 and 7, and between exits 8A and 12. Interstate 787 between exits 3 and 5, and between exits 8 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
